com.aheaditec.apdu.structures

Class PinInfoBasic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aheaditec.apdu.structures.PinInfoBasic

  • public class PinInfoBasic
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic information about PIN object presented to the user. Attributes are the defined in IAS v4.4 documentation as is their meaning.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected PinInfoBasic(byte[] pinInfoData, byte[] appletParamData)
      Constructor uses parsing functions below to create PinInfoBasic object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getPinLength()
      Get PIN object length.
      int getPinMaximumLength()
      Specifies maximum allowed length of the PIN object.
      int getPinMinimumLength()
      Specifies minumum allowed length of the PIN object.
      VerifyCodes getPinReference()
      Get VerifyCodes object specifying PIN object.
      int getPinTryLimit()
      Specifies PIN object try limit.
      byte getPinUnblockPinReference()
      If unblock is allowed, this byte holds unblock PIN reference.
      boolean isAllowPinChange()
      Specifies if PIN object can be changed.
      boolean isAllowUnblock()
      Specifies if PIN object can be unblocked.
      boolean isForcePinChangeAtFirstUse()
      Specifies if pin must be changed at first use.
      boolean isSessionAllowed()
      Specifies if session PIN can be used with this PIN object.
      java.lang.String toString()

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PinInfoBasic

        protected PinInfoBasic(@NonNull
                       byte[] pinInfoData,
                       @NonNull
                       byte[] appletParamData)
        Constructor uses parsing functions below to create PinInfoBasic object.
        Parameters:
        pinInfoData - BER-TLV encoded data containing PIN object information.
        appletParamData - BER-TLV encoded data containing session PIN reference.

      • getPinReference

        @NonNull
public VerifyCodes getPinReference()
        Get VerifyCodes object specifying PIN object.

      • getPinLength

        public int getPinLength()
        Get PIN object length. For security reasons always same as maximum length.

      • getPinMaximumLength

        public int getPinMaximumLength()
        Specifies maximum allowed length of the PIN object.

        public int getPinMinimumLength()
        Specifies minumum allowed length of the PIN object.

        Specifies if PIN object can be unblocked.

      • getPinUnblockPinReference

        public byte getPinUnblockPinReference()
        If unblock is allowed, this byte holds unblock PIN reference.

        public boolean isAllowPinChange()
        Specifies if PIN object can be changed.

        public boolean isForcePinChangeAtFirstUse()
        Specifies if pin must be changed at first use.
